message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split is fair and will allow us to avoid further devaluation of the money.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I believe a more balanced split is possible.  This is my counter-offer.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
Bob, it's clear we both want a larger share, but letting this drag on hurts us both.  This offer is closer to my original, acknowledging the time lost to inflation.
